about_the_game:
The Distance You Travel Is Your Currency

Rack up Kilometers as you automatically drive forward, then spend them to upgrade your vehicle.  The further you drive, the faster you drive, which lets you drive further, faster.

Choose Your Preferred Build

Maneuver your way around obstacles with Handling or brute force your way through them with Armor. Select upgrades that let you combo Boosts or opt to automate them entirely.  Whether you prefer an active playstyle or want to sit back and idle, there exists a build you can enjoy.

Reinforce Upgrades Exponentially

Scroll through an extensive array of upgrades, then decide which ones to strengthen, improving their power, duration, effectiveness, and more. Uncovering additional secrets will let you promote upgrades even further beyond.

Save The Girl... Or Her Enemy?

Race back to your childhood friend- a trusting girl who's been hurt one too many times.  You can't seem to remember how you got separated, but her overprotective friend won't hesitate to remind you of all the times you screwed up.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: you don't need much
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: almost anything will do
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: the music is beautiful
  • Additional Notes: it's an idle game you'll be fine
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 9001+
  • Processor: twenty-five i50 quad-core 99.9GHz
  • Memory: 9999 GB RAM
  • Graphics: an $80,000 monitor will work nicely
  • Storage: 9999 GB available space
  • Sound Card: you need a personal home theater w/ surround sound
  • Additional Notes: still won't give you AAA graphics

short_description: An incremental game where you race along an obstacle-ridden track to gain distance. Automatically drive forward & rack up Kilometers then spend them to form your stat build and choose upgrades to match your preferred playstyle in order to maybe, possibly save the girl who's madly in love with you.
